name: Welcome to Pair-O-Dice
description:
WSAD to Steer!   Space to Drift!

Roll your car to roll your fuzzy mirror dice. Different rolls give the car different Abilities such as the Wrecking Ball, or the Passenger Seat Shotgun.

The Blue Shield prevents all Damage, and the Red PowerSlide turns your Drift into a One-Hit Kill!

See how many Monsters you can Squish!

A game by Lennard, Ryan, Nico, and Chris.

All art, code, and music created during the jam.

Music by: Chris Moncrieffe of Drop Dead Ugly Studios, LLC
